statements: SELECT * FROM popular_food_destinations;
SELECT name, location FROM popular_food_destinations;
SELECT * FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT name FROM popular_food_destinations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT id, name, location, cuisine FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE location = 'Paris' AND cuisine = 'French' ORDER BY location DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, location FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE cuisine IN ('Japanese', 'Korean') ORDER BY location ASC, name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, location FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, cuisine FROM popular_food_destinations WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY cuisine ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, address FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian'
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE reviewer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY review_id DESC
SELECT name, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Chinese' AND rating >= 4.0
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3.0
SELECT name, cuisine, address, rating FROM restaurants ORDER BY rating DESC, name
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC, reviewer_name
SELECT name, address, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY name
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%amazing%' ORDER BY review_id
SELECT * FROM restaurants JOIN reviews ON restaurants.id = reviews.restaurant_id WHERE restaurants.rating > 4.5 ORDER BY restaurants.rating DESC
SELECT * FROM destination;
SELECT name, city, country FROM destination WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT destination_id, city, rating FROM destination ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, cuisine FROM restaurant WHERE rating < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM review WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM destination;
SELECT name, city, country FROM destination WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT name, cuisine, city FROM restaurant ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT destination.name, restaurant.name, review.rating FROM destination INNER JOIN review ON destination.destination_id = review.destination_id INNER JOIN restaurant ON review.restaurant_id = restaurant.restaurant_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, comment FROM review WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM restaurants;
SELECT name, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, location FROM restaurants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM locations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT r.name AS restaurant_name, c.name AS cuisine_name FROM restaurants r JOIN cuisines c ON r.cuisine = c.id WHERE r.id = 1;
SELECT name, location, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian'
SELECT location, name FROM restaurants WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM cuisines WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR name = 'Mexican'
SELECT id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%'
SELECT * FROM restaurants;
SELECT name, location, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT id, name FROM dishes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM restaurants;
SELECT name, cuisine, rating FROM restaurants WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT name, location, cuisine FROM restaurants WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT name, rating FROM restaurants WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, location, rating FROM restaurants JOIN locations ON restaurants.location = locations.name ORDER BY rating DESC;
